Headline: Temporary #12 Roosevelt Reroute at Roosevelt/Western
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted near Roosevelt/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ogden, Western, Roosevelt, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at LaSalle
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 47th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to a medical emergency on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
